configuration cache

proposal state

The configuration cache holds all collected informations from the configuration process and provides them to the later performed building process.

topics:

  • storing of module related settings
  • storing of config_custem settings and detected state
    • c header
    • c functions
    • external libraries and applications (modules ?)
